altername_name: Yeti Quest: Die Pinguine räumen auf
name: Jewel Link: Arctic Quest
overview: Help Yeti and his penguin friends save their Antartic home from the ice storm Explore 100 levels of challenging match-3 gameplay Lead the penguin team safely through the dangers that await them Use each penguin's skill to help you in your quest Features 3 game modes swap, chain and group Cool graphics and cute penguin characters An ice-cold match-3 puzzle adventure!
